original_text: I want to tell you many more things, but I do not want to write about them in a letter. Instead, I hope to come and visit you. Then I can see you and we can talk together. Then we will be completely happy.
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 쓸 것이 많으나 종이와 먹으로 쓰기를 원하지 아니하고 오히려 너희에게 가서 대면하여 말하려 하니 이는 너희 기쁨을 충만하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: I want to tell you many more things
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 당신에게 더 많은 것들을 이야기하고 싶지만

sentences.original_text: but I do not want to write about them in a letter
Instead, I hope to come and visit you
Then we will be completely happy
